sentence.Network_en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentence.Network_cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentence.Network_en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentence.Network_cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentence.Network_en: The federal government hiked the tax on hard liquor.
sentence.Network_cn: 联邦政府提高了烈性酒的税率。
